name: Labyrinth (itch) (Nico Arch)
description:
Hi dear human!!

Thank's for downloading the game!!

The game is under development, I will add more functionalities in the future.

The game is free, but you can support its future development $$$ :D!

Instructions:

Extract the zip file and run the Labyrinth.exe file

  1. Use the arrow buttons to move.
  2. Press the CTRL button to speed.
  3. Collect the Keys to win the Levels

Let's get some fun!!!

Nico Arch
